sentences.english: He prefers scripts read to him by someone who can turn the words alive.
sentences.chinese: 他喜歡讓能把臺詞說得活靈活現的人把劇本讀給他聽。

sentences.english: View within the ice also lifelike, vivid.
sentences.chinese: 冰塊內的觀賞也同樣栩栩如生，活靈活現。

sentences.english: Paper-cut can picture the presentation of the content lifelike delicated ghost axe god knife.
sentences.chinese: 剪紙能將畫面的內容表現的活靈活現實屬鬼斧神刀。

sentences.english: Someone should tell this one to stop clowning around.
sentences.chinese: 小貓的屁股和後腿部分形成了一個活靈活現的小丑。
